title: Transfer Agency Global Product Manager - Fixed Term Contract
jobDescription:
At BBH we value diverse backgrounds, so if your experience looks a little different from what we've outlined and you think you can bring value to the role, we will still welcome your application!

What You Can Expect At BBH:

If you join BBH you will find a collaborative environment that enables you to step outside your role to add value wherever you can. You will have direct access to clients, information and experts across all business areas around the world. BBH will provide you with opportunities to grow your expertise, take on new challenges, and reinvent yourself—without leaving the firm. We encourage a culture of inclusion that values each employee’s unique perspective. We provide a high-quality benefits program emphasizing good health, financial security, and peace of mind. Ultimately we want you to have rewarding work with the flexibility to enjoy personal and family experiences at every career stage. Our BBH Cares program offers volunteer opportunities to give back to your community and help transform the lives of others.

Transfer Agency Global Product Manager - Fixed term contract

Job Description

At Brown Brothers Harriman, we value passionate, committed people who enjoy collaborating with others to find new solutions to complex business challenges. We are looking for the type of person who speaks their mind, truly listens and steps outside their role to add value wherever they can. Someone who is driven to get things done and views obstacles as an exciting challenge that demands a creative solution. Above all, we seek someone who takes great pride in their work and is inspired and motivated by their role in protecting and enhancing our client’s financial well-being.

If you are looking for an entrepreneurial environment where you can learn and thrive, Brown Brothers Harriman is the right place for you.

This is a fixed term contract to cover a maternity leave in the team

Transfer Agency Product Manager

As a Transfer Agency (TA) Product Manager you will have input into the strategic vision, management and development of the TA product offering and for the long-term profitability of the product. You will report to the Global Head of TA Product. To be successful in the role you will need to leverage your strong subject matter expertise in Transfer Agency product offerings, revenue streams and workflows. You will be required to specify market requirements for current and future products as well as develop a target Client base by leveraging external market indices and relevant market evaluation. This role will drive solutions across multi-disciplinary teams (including Systems, Service Delivery, Marketing Communications and Office of the General Counsel).

Product Management

  • Assist in the development of a clear, concise, strategic vision for the product

  • Support key stakeholders in the long-term profitability of the product

  • Develop a global product offering for the product – with consistent operating models, marketing, pricing, services etc

  • Ensure that product development matches industry developments and client strategic direction

  • Ensure that product development matches BBH's strategic goals and leverages existing architecture/services

  • Assist Service Delivery in their drives to be more efficient, more controlled and more automated

  • Work with marketing to develop and maintain all collateral (both for internal and external marketing) associated with this product

  • Ensure that technical support is available and compatible to enhance the exposure, and market readiness of the product

Risk and Regulatory

  • Ensure that new and non-standard services (e.g. offer to a specific client at their request) have the appropriate level of risk management and control embedded

  • Navigate BBH’s approval processes for approval of new products, services, and pricing

  • Follow regulatory matters that will impact the TA business and ensure appropriate plans are in place to prepare for such changes

  • Look for opportunities to create additional products, services and revenue from such changes

Industry Engagement

  • Assist sales and Relationship Management partners to reach the targets and goals, whilst balancing the profitability of the TA product

  • represent BBH at industry events, ensuring BBH’s brand and reputation is upheld in the  marketplace as leading provider of TA

Qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree, and/or equivalent work experience.

  • Prior Experience with managing, developing and/or selling Investor Services products

  • 7+ years of product management experience.

  • Prior supervisory experience

  • Ability to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing.

  • High degree of analytical ability.

  • Strong aptitude for numbers, accuracy and organization.

  • Ability to work quickly and accurately under pressure.

  • Ability to communicate effectively with others.

  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills.

  • Ability to learn and adapt to multiple IT and Information Systems.

  • Ability to identify, recommend and implement solutions.

  • Strong familiarity with asset management front and middle office processes and technology

What You Can Expect At BBH:

If you join BBH you will find collaborative environment that enables you to step outside your role to add value wherever you can. You will have direct access to clients, information and experts across all business areas around the world. BBH will provide you with opportunities to grow your expertise, take on new challenges, and reinvent yourself—without leaving the firm. We encourage a culture of inclusion that values each employee’s unique perspective. We provide a high-quality benefits program emphasizing good health, financial security, and peace of mind. Ultimately, we want you to have rewarding work with the flexibility to enjoy personal and family experiences at every career stage. Our BBH Cares program offers volunteer opportunities to give back to your community and help transform the lives of others.
